summary: Diff implements early WebAudio initialization with a one-time user-gesture unlock on PlayPage, adds a DPR scaling utility for crisp canvas rendering, and updates obstacle rendering to provide clearer UFO/penguin/alien silhouettes with texture-backed overlays and fallbacks. However, the diff summary is truncated for key loop code and does not show explicit focus/visibility pause/resume handling for the RAF loop, nor does it show the actual required new texture image assets being added under frontend/public/assets/generated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Enforce a stable 60fps game loop target and add focus/visibility handling so the game loop is paused/stopped when the tab/app loses focus and is resumed when focus returns, without causing blank renders or duplicated loops.
missing_requirements.reason: useGameLoop.ts is truncated right as RAF loop logic starts; the diff summary provides no evidence of document visibilitychange/window blur handlers, nor evidence that the loop is stopped and restarted cleanly without duplicated RAF callbacks after multiple hide/show cycles.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate and include new high-detail toon textures under frontend/public/assets/generated and wire them into the existing toon texture loader/rendering pipeline.
missing_requirements.reason: The loader is wired to new generated texture paths, but the diff summary does not show the actual image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated (only code changes are shown).
